body:
Comment 2: 
did some research on this.

i386   glibc-devel
x86_64 glibc-devel.i686 glibc-devel.x86_64

however this means if we add docs for centos then we need to do Suse, redhat, archlinux.
list starts getting long.

Would be it better to add a generic docs, stating install the 32bit 64bit glibc headers
for your distro as required?
